extDescription.message: أوقات الصلاة بما في ذلك جميع الجدول الزمني العام على أساس تحديد الموقع الجغرافي بما في ذلك خيارات لتغيير طرق الحساب.

extBy.description: Phrases that says the extension is developed by.

extSource.description: Phrases that says the location where source code is available in.

day.description: The label 'Day' for the month. Usually numbered from 1-31

12hour.description: Time formating for 12 hour clock including suffix.

12hourNoSuffix.description: Time formating for 12 hour clock without suffix.

next.description: Next button text that displays in the timetable.

previous.description: Previous button text that displays in the timetable.

options.description: The options label to visit the settings page.

save.description: The save label for an action of saving.

search.description: The search label for an action of searching.

cancel.description: The search label for an action of canceling.

close.description: The close label for an action of closing.

latitude.description: Measurement of a location on earth, lines that appear horizontal.

longitude.description: Measurement of a location on earth, lines that appear vertical.

optionsWarning.message: تأكد من حفظ الإعدادات الخاصة بك القيام به بعد التحرير!
optionsWarning.description: Options warning to make sure the user selects save after done editing.

optionSaveResponse.description: Response when a user hits save.

locationOnMap.description: Label showing the user his/her location on the map.

locationSettings.description: Heading label that shows the location settings.

timeSettings.description: Heading label that shows the time settings.

timeFormat.description: Sub header label for time format group.

notFound.description: Standard text for location not found.

calculationsSettings.description: Heading label for Prayer time calculation settings.

visibleTimenames.description: Sub header labels for visible time names.

fetchingGeolocation.description: Fetching geolocation text in the popup.

searchPlaceholder.description: Searching placeholder in the text box. Assited text.

pleaseWait.description: Asking user to please wait for extension loading.

timePrecaution.message: وتستند مرات أعلاه على الحسابات فقط. أرجو أن تسمحوا -- / + 3 دقائق لصلاة الفجر، 1 دقيقة عن الظهر، والمغرب 2 دقيقة كاجراء وقائي.
timePrecaution.description: A warning to the user when using the calculations. This will be shown in the timetable page.

calculationMethod.description: Label that denotes the prayer calculation to use.
